name: University Recipes
description:
Prototype made for 3rd term university project.

How to play:

Currently you'll start in an empty void.
Press  & hold your right primary button on your oculus controller to open your handy menu wheel. Then proceed to touch the top button with your left hand to reload the actual scene.

You can check your ingame instructions & timer on your tablet located on your left arm.
Timer starts when you start cutting anything.
Use smooth movement (with both control sticks) or teleport movement (any of your two trigger buttons).

Use your menu wheel to reload the scene, if you wish to play again.
